title: Am I too old to listen to Ariana Grande? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, you asked anonymously and didn’t tell me your age, so it’s kind of hard to answer without any information. Oh wait…no it’s not. No one is ever too old or too young for any musician. If a 6-year-old wants to listen to death metal, or if an 80-year-old wants to listen to K-pop, that’s fine, because no music can only be acceptable for a specific aged audience. So the answer is no, you’re not. Rock on, -Quora’s favorite ssssnotelek 🐍

Here’s a scenario. Let’s say your favorite song is “Perdido” by Duke Ellington. You’re on a drive with your 13-year-old daughter, and she plugs her phone into the car stereo. What’s the song? “Perdido”, by Duke Ellington. Do you rip the plug from her phone in outrage, and lash out at her for listening to old music? No. Because music is meant to be shared, experienced, and loved by people of all ages.  Listen to whoever or whatever makes you happy.

Ariana Grande is an artist and there is no age for listening to music. If your favourite artist is Ariana then you're free to listen to her songs. Even my friends great grand mom who is approximately 90 years old listens to Ariana Grande
